org.yeheng.chatbot

Class ChatEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yeheng.chatbot.ChatEngine

  • public class ChatEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The ChatEngine class is the core of YeHeng.org Chatbot. This engine works by separating the clauses and matching the clauses with synsets or antsets. It can also match by Includes or ExactMatch which are both simple but lacking usability. The clause separation is provided by Stanford CoreNLP OpenIE, and the Synsets and Antsets are provided by Princeton WordNet, with the MIT JWI wrapper.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    The YeHeng.org Chatbot Project
    See Also:
    "Stanford CoreNLP", "Princeton WordNet", "MIT JWI"
